subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
lead_paragraph: T-Mobile rider Patrik Sinkewitz’s positive drug test, taken a month before the start of the Tour de France, threatens the team’s sponsorship and could further erode public support for cycling.
snippet: T-Mobile rider Patrik Sinkewitz’s positive drug test, taken a month before the start of the Tour de France, threatens the team’s sponsorship and could further erode public support for cycling.
